page.title: 03Heavy Goods Vehicles
page.content: Covering some of the{landscape}at Great Dunham there is a{transport company.This is an example of local {industry.}At the lorry depot there are twenty lorries of which the smallest when full up weighs sixteen tons and the heaviest when full up weighs thirty eight tons.The make of the lorries are ELF and Volvo.Also in the lorry depot is a farm where there are four barns and four tractors.The {farming}land covers one hundred and seventy nine acres (but not all of them are in Great Dunham).Going into the{farming}side of it the most widely grown crop is wheat whereas the most stored crop is barley then wheat.In the farm there are two full time workers and one half time worker.Inthe {transport}work shop there are three workers two office workers and sixteen drivers .
